resources.string: The password should be 8 characters.Please try again
Password do not match!Please try again.
Are you sure you want to quit?
*The device will uplink valid ADV data with RSSI no less than %ddBm.
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW003 use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW003 use the bluetooth and location permission
LW003 requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW003 cannot be used normally.
After that, LW003 could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow LW003 use the Location permission
LW003 requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW003 cannot be used normally.
LW003 requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, LW003 cannot be used normally.
*Turn on the Filter Condition %s ,all filtration of this page will take effect.Turn off the Filter Condition %s, all filtration of this page will not take effect.
